CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Labs relative to Nova Institute?
SRP.A: Oracle Labs is {below} Nova Institute in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Labs relative to Echo Research?
SRP.A: Oracle Labs is {below} Echo Research in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Foundation relative to Starburst College?
SRP.A: Crimson Foundation is {above} Starburst College in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Institute}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Foundation}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Research's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Research's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1983}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Institute's maximum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Institute's maximum Research Grants Awarded is in {1983}.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1973, did the total Research Grants Awarded experience a larger or smaller change than between 1975 and 1976?
NC.A: The change in total research grants awarded between 1969 and 1973 was {larger} than between 1975 and 1976.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1965 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1965 was {higher} than in 1981.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1977 higher or lower than in 1978?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1977 was {lower} than in 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1980, was the average total Research Grants Awarded higher or lower than between 1965 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total research grants awarded between 1969 and 1980 was {lower} than between 1965 and 1986.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Institute} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Echo Research and Starburst College first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Echo Research and Starburst College first exchanged leading positions in {1965}.
